title: Protocol Buffer JSON Descriptor
description: JSON Schema for Protocol Buffer descriptors generated by buf/protoc with validation annotations

number.description: Field number (must be unique within the message)

typeName.description: For message and enum types, the fully qualified type name

oneofIndex.description: Index of the oneof group this field belongs to

lt.description: Field must be less than this value

lte.description: Field must be less than or equal to this value

gt.description: Field must be greater than this value

gte.description: Field must be greater than or equal to this value

in.description: Field must be one of these values

not_in.description: Field must not be one of these values
